```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(polite)

url <-"https://www.amazon.com/s?k=whey+protein+powder&crid=3ETM5W1STQFYU&sprefix=%2Caps%2C405&ref=nb_sb_ss_recent_1_0_recent"

session <- bow(url,user_agent = "For Educational Purposes Only")

amazon_page<-read_html(url)

whey_pro <-amazon_page %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-text-normal")%>%
  html_text()
whey_pro

wheylist50 <- whey_pro[2:55]
wheylist50

whey_prices <- amazon_page %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-price-whole")%>%
  html_text
whey_prices  


whey_Ratings <- amazon_page %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-section.a-spacing-none.a-spacing-top-micro")%>%
  html_text
whey_Ratings


whey_noReviews <- amazon_page %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-size-base.s-underline-text") %>%
  html_text
whey_noReviews


```
